participant_1.background:
I've been working at my current job for three years, and I'm really happy here.
I lost my job as a nurse after I was diagnosed with cancer.
I am an artist from a small town in the midwest.
my favorite car is the ford mustang.
i have been cheated on by every ex girlfriend except for one.

participant_2.background:
I spend way too much time watching Grey's Anatomy.
I'm a happy homebody despite my career and my love for milk.
My appreciation of nature is a key part of my personality.
I want a place where I can feel safe and comfortable, and where I can be myself.
i like to go swimming.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going so far?
It is going well, thank you! How is yours?
It's going good! I just got back from work. I'm an artist, and I've been working on a new painting.
Ooh, that sounds interesting! I love art. I'm a homebody, so I spend a lot of time watching Grey's Anatomy and swimming.
That's cool! I've never seen Grey's Anatomy, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely check it out! It's a medical drama, and it's really addictive.
I will have to! I've been looking for a new show to watch.
Oh, I'm sure you'll like it. What kind of art do you do?
I'm a painter, and I mostly do landscapes. I love nature, and I love capturing the beauty of it in my paintings.
That's really cool! I love nature too. I'm always taking pictures of it.
I'd love to see some of your pictures sometime!
Sure! I can send you some.
